name: @involvex/auto-vue
description: Full automated Vue Setup with 3 git branches: main, dev, github pages

scripts.fix: npm run format && npm run lint:fix
scripts.pretest: npm run build && npm run snapshot
scripts.preversion: git fetch && git status -uno | grep -q 'Your branch is up to date'
scripts.deploy: node -e "const {platform} = require('os'); if (platform() === 'win32') { require('child_process').execSync('powershell -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -File ./scripts/deploy.ps1', {stdio: 'inherit'}); } else { require('child_process').execSync('zx ./scripts/deploy.mjs', {stdio: 'inherit'}); }"
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build && npm run format && npm run lint:fix && npm run release && npm run git:sync
scripts.git:sync: git add . && git commit -m "chore: automated deployment $(date +'%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S')" && git push origin main && (git tag -a v$(node -p "require('./package.json').version") -m "Release v$(node -p "require('./package.json').version")" 2>/dev/null || echo "Tag already exists") && git push origin --tags
scripts.git:push: git push origin main && git push origin --tags

author: involvex
